column5: Hey all,  Great weekend in Lake of Bays last weekend. Some great bass fishing.  I was thinking about trying braided line instead of my Rapala Finesse line. My only concern is that the braided line seems far more visible that the mono line Im using.  I would rather not use any leaders when I fish...I dont like tying line directly to line.  Can I go from the braided line direct to a swivel/lure? Wouldn't using a leader diminish the value of the strength of the braided line?  just tyring to figure this out before I spend the 20 bux on the line...  All the best,  Jack

Hi Jack.  There is many great conversations that have been had over braided line on this board.  Here are a few for you.  poll on line type braided line fishing line  Just make sure you use mono as a backing when you spool braided on...  PS, welcome to the site. Geoff
Shouldnt a Mod move this to general?  Oh and welcome.
oops. Thought I had posted this in general
Na worries bud.Im sure it will get there soon,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Right Roy?
HAHA, see more post on this already...
Roy yer sooooo slow. Thanks MARTY.

Ok back to the question. Lots of us use braid,but will tie on either mono or some sort of floro combo as a lead.  Have you concidered using a very small swivel to tie line to line? Or(and this is not to be rude) are you not confident in your line to line knots?
Sorry, me brudder. I was watchin' dem lil' teletubby rascals wit the small folks.
Which ones yer fav? I like the purple one.LOL
Animated Knots online ! !  http://www.animatedknots.com/indexfishing....imatedknots.com   Works well for ALL KNOTS  ! !

okokokok...my confidence in my knot tying is a 0 out of 10  ill try it this weekend...goodbye lures.  Going to try to jig for the whitefish im marking on the bottom at 70 ft....  see if I can finally snag one.
I suck at tying knots too but the polamar is SO easy...
